name: Slaking
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Swing
attacks.effect: You may do 100 more damage. If you do, during your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 100 more damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
